answerText: Markov chain [or Markov process][10] This is the general term for any method that has a deterministic runtime but may have an incorrect output. The Metropolis algorithm is this kind of probabilistic algorithm contrasted with Las Vegas algorithms.
heading: ACF Regionals |2015 | MIT A & Texas A&M A  | 20 | Science | Math | College
subject: Science
question: Question: These objects have a square transition matrix where rows add up to one. For 10 points each: [10] Name these discrete-time finite or infinite-state stochastic processes where the probability of transition to the next state only depends on the current one.
